roleset.name: bill becomes law

example.name: pass-v: passive
example.text: The Senate - House conference committee is used when a bill is passed by the House and Senate in different forms .

example.name: pass-v: distinguishing arg1 from arg2
example.text: John passed the bill into law .

example.name: passing-n: arg1
example.text: On 14 February , in a statement in which he spoke of a " painful choice " and his " undying determination , " Premier Chang Chun - hsiung announced the resumption of work on the Fourth Nuclear Power Plant , and identified the passing of a plebiscite law as the most important topic for renewed cross - party consultation .

example.name: passage-n: Args 0 and 1
example.text: congressional and presidential passage of an increase in the federal debt ceiling

propbank.arg: of an increase in the federal debt ceiling

example.name: passage-n: arg 1 only
example.text: passage of two constitutional amendment bills

roleset.note: PASS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pass' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'fail', 'give', 'send', and reference to verbnet classes give-13.1, send-11.1, and throw-17.1. There are probably a million senses and phrasals I've missed; the syntax tendsto be pretty straightforward, so if you encounter them while tagging just go ahead and add them. (from pass.01-v predicate notes)
PASSING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on on499-nouns-be. (from passing.03-n)
PASSAGE-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to pass.01. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from passage.01-n)

roleset.name: overtake

example.name: pass-v: transitive
example.text: A couple of my law clerks were going to pass me in three or four years .

propbank.arg: A couple of my law clerks

example.name: make_pass-l: Within LVC all arguments
example.text: Disaster almost struck as Erik made his pass of the leader on the 13th lap .

example.name: passing-n: in passing
example.text: SAw the punch in passing , looked a decent one - two .

example.name: passing-n: Both args
example.text: I think his passing her in the stair - well is simply him not knowing what to do with a distraught woman

roleset.note: PASS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pass' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'fail', 'give', 'send', and reference toverbnet classes give-13.1, send-11.1, and throw-17.1. There areprobably a million senses and phrasals I've missed; the syntax tendsto be pretty straightforward, so if you encounter them while taggingjust go ahead and add them. (from pass.02-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: go by

example.name: pass-v: time passes
example.text: Hardly a day passes without news photos of the police dragging limp protestors from some building .

propbank.arg: without news photos of the police dragging limp protestors from some building

example.name: passage-n: arg 1 as a modifier
example.text: time 's passage

example.name: passage-n: non-time example (meaning 'to go by')
example.text: completely free passage is to be ensured

roleset.note: PASS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pass' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'fail', 'give', 'send', and reference toverbnet classes give-13.1, send-11.1, and throw-17.1. There areprobably a million senses and phrasals I've missed; the syntax tendsto be pretty straightforward, so if you encounter them while taggingjust go ahead and add them. (from pass.03-v predicate notes)
PASSAGE-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to pass.03. Vn class spend_time-104. Framed by Katie. (from passage.02-n)
PASSED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from passed.03-j)

roleset.name: allow to go by

example.name: pass-v: NP object
example.text: Warner has passed , or chosen not to produce , at least 76 .

example.name: pass-v: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Devotees pass hours , watching the lights blink and listening to the metal balls ping , as much to gamble as to get a little time to be anonymous , alone with their thoughts .

propbank.arg: watching the lights blink and listening to the metal balls ping
as much to gamble as to get a little time to be anonymous , alone with their thoughts

roleset.note: PASS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pass' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'fail', 'give', 'send', and reference to verbnet classes give-13.1, send-11.1, and throw-17.1. There areprobably a million senses and phrasals I've missed; the syntax tends to be pretty straightforward, so if you encounter them while tagging just go ahead and add them. (from pass.04-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: give

example.name: pass-v: idiomatic meaning, compositional syntax
example.text: He is just passing the buck to young people .

example.name: pass-n: All arguments
example.text: His pass of the ball to the other team 's player was infamous .

roleset.note: PASS-V NOTES: Similarly "pass_along", which is often misparsed in Treebank. (from pass.05-v)
PASS-N NOTES: Roleset baesd on verb entry pass.05. Corresponds to VN class give-13.1. (from pass.02-n)

roleset.name: suffice, get away (with)

example.name: pass-v: pass for
example.text: ... the claptrap that passes for consensus in various international institutions .

roleset.note: PASS-V NOTES: Can also be "pass as" (from pass.06-v)

roleset.name: pass a class, pass a test

example.name: pass-v: success!
example.text: The number of balloonists who have passed a Federal Aviation Authority lighter - than - air test has doubled in the last year .

propbank.arg: a Federal Aviation Authority lighter - than - air test

roleset.note: PASS-V NOTES: One presumes the test itself is not lighter than air. (from pass.07-v)

roleset.name: push through a passage (like a clot)

role.descr: thing passed (clot, gas, kidney stone, etc)

example.name: pass-v: whoever smelt it...
example.text: Cruz then allegedly moved closer to one of the officers and passed gas , the station reported .

example.name: pass-v: Bladder sharks?
example.text: Recently I passed a kidney stone that looked like a shark 's tooth .

propbank.arg: a kidney stone that looked like a shark 's tooth

example.name: pass-v: Why are all these examples so painful?
example.text: My partner passed a blood clot in his urine today after falling through his ceiling about 2 weeks ago and bruising his boy bits .

propbank.arg: after falling through his ceiling about 2 weeks ago and bruising his boy bits

example.name: pass-v: non-medical/bodily-function-related
example.text: If the line passed a clog , it 's probably sitting in your filter causing a by - pass situation .

roleset.note: PASS-V NOTES: Reframed by Julia. No VNcls. (from pass.08-v)

roleset.name: die

example.name: passing-n: only arg
example.text: We talked about her husband 's passing in March .

example.name: passing-n: arg1
example.text: Zemin Jiang , president of the People 's Republic of China , and Peng Li , premier of the State Council , sent a telegraph of condolences on the 23rd on the passing of former US President , Richard Nixon .

propbank.arg: of former US President , Richard Nixon

example.name: pass_on-v: so sorry
example.text: John 's cat passed on last week .

example.name: pass_away-v: die
example.text: but you have [ unintellegible ] Lewis Powell was one of your sources because he ' passed away .

roleset.note: PASS-V NOTES: Based on Sharp data. Comparison to pass.15. No VN class. FN class process_end. Framed by Katie. (from pass.20-v)
PASSING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on on499-nouns-be. (from passing.02-n)
PASS_ON-V NOTES: Frame edited by Arrick (from pass.15-v)
PASS_AWAY-V NOTES: Frame added by Arrick (from pass.16-v).
MWE merge notes: this roleset subsumes the former pass-away.16 roleset, in use in AMR 2019 and previous versions of PB (prior to PB 3.4).

roleset.name: make a pass at, attempt something (esp flirtation)

example.name: make_pass-l: Flirtatious pass, within LVC
example.text: Josh makes clumsy passes at Kate when she 's seething with anger and fear , but we know from the outset that he 's not a member of the evil patriarchy .

propbank.arg: when she 's seething with anger and fear

roleset.note: PASS-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj. Comparison to verb-attempt.01. (from pass.03-n)

roleset.name: overtake, go past

example.name: pass_by-v
example.text: ... an important official or a member of the gentry passed by in a carriage or sedan chair ...

propbank.arg: an important official or a member of the gentry
in a carriage or sedan chair

roleset.note: PASS_BY-V NOTES: (from pass.17-v)

roleset.name: offer for acceptance under false pretext

example.name: pass_off-v
example.text: The charges ran the gamut from not filling out proper forms to purchasing phoney export contracts and trying to pass them off to customs .

example.name: pass_off-v: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG3
example.text: Some even wear army uniforms to pass themselves off as soldiers , and enter and steal from the camps .

roleset.note: PASS_OFF-V NOTES: Frame created by Jena (from pass.18-v)

roleset.name: give, pass_on: give

example.name: pass_on-v: give
example.text: Insurers typically pass on a small percentage of the risks they underwrite ( to their customers ) .

propbank.arg: a small percentage of the risks they underwrite

example.name: passing_on-n: args 1, 2
example.text: But the alertness of the road guards prevented the passing of this quantity on to our youth .

roleset.note: PASS_ON-V NOTES: frame by Perryn (from pass.09-v predicate notes)
PASSING_ON-N NOTES: Added Julia base (from passing.04-n)

roleset.name: act as a middle man in the giving process

example.name: pass_on-v: passive
example.text: Both the costs and the savings could be passed on to shippers on the TransCanada pipeline .

propbank.arg: Both the costs and the savings
to shippers on the TransCanada pipeline

example.name: pass_on-v: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2 and ARG3
example.text: it was carried at full speed either by a single runner or ( if the distance was great ) by relays of runners who passed it on from hand to hand .

roleset.note: PASS_ON-V NOTES: frame by Perryn (from pass.14-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: to move on from a place to another place

example.name: pass_on-v: topical
example.text: We pass on from this town of scholarly associations to the industrial centre of Bath , well known for its great shipyards .

propbank.arg: from this town of scholarly associations
to the industrial centre of Bath , well known for its great shipyards

roleset.note: PASS_ON-V NOTES: frame by Perryn (from pass.19-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: distribute

example.name: pass_out-v: passive
example.text: The test booklets were passed out 48 hours ahead of time .

roleset.note: PASS_OUT-V NOTES: (from pass.10-v)

roleset.name: faint

example.name: pass_out-v: ARG0
example.text: and my buddy passes out .

roleset.note: PASS_OUT-V NOTES: (from pass.11-v)

roleset.name: ignore, leave behind

example.name: pass_over-v: transitive active
example.text: ... a small French merchant bank that Deutsche Bank had looked at and passed over .

roleset.note: PASS_OVER-V NOTES: (from pass.12-v)

roleset.name: relinquish

example.name: pass_up-v: transitive
example.text: Gorbachev is unlikely to pass up the opportunity to press once again for negotiated cuts in the navies of both nations .

propbank.arg: the opportunity to press once again for negotiated cuts in the navies of both nations

roleset.note: PASS_UP-V NOTES: Similarly "pass_by" (from pass.13-v)

roleset.name: occur, perhaps as foretold

example.name: come_to_pass-m
example.text: And lo , it came to pass that Scott Baio tweeted his support for Scott Walker .

propbank.arg: that Scott Baio tweeted his support for Scott Walker

roleset.note: COME_TO_PASS-M NOTES:

roleset.name: ignore or forgive an offense

example.name: give_pass-l: all args
example.text: He 's supposed to be a genius , and that 's why we gave him a pass on the tax stuff .

roleset.note: Prepped by Tim during MWE framing
